title: Why hooks are the best form of cc :D

replies.body: -picks poppy supp and stands on adc with W- boop
https://i.imgur.com/iFngsuw.png
i do this all the time lol. Ap poppy support

I had a poppy shit a brick once. I play Ekko and also note this is high plat elo. I E dash and blink to her when she has her W up and kill her. 

Poppy in all chat. HOW DID YOU DASH TO ME!!!!
Me: uh.... not a dash instant blink.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcub2000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uUT55XuM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-11T12:26:51.918+0000)
>
> -picks poppy supp and stands on adc with W- boop

LeBlanc: Report Poppy, not letting me kill their adc.
the worst is when you aim your abilities thinking the enemy have the skills to dodge but they never do and you miss

> [{quoted}](name=FakeGravity,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uUT55XuM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-11T18:06:13.276+0000)
>
> the worst is when you aim your abilities thinking the enemy have the skills to dodge but they never do and you miss

Another bad thing is when _you_ have the skills to dodge, but your ally is right behind you and they get hit instead XD
Big facts
Then you don't know if they're so bad they can't dodge or so good they predicted your prediction.
that's why it's impossible to hit skillshots in normal games
Just throw it at him....

> [{quoted}](name=FakeGravity,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uUT55XuM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-11T18:06:13.276+0000)
>
> the worst is when you aim your abilities thinking the enemy have the skills to dodge but they never do and you miss

So much this! So embarrassing...
Hooks catch hookers.
This pikachu face is a new meme? Seen it twice in  one hour
yea I think it is ive seen it often on shit like twitter and insta
Picks Alistar and shows off his own brand of point and click Justice.

I tend to prefer the 'ol "Nuke them faster than they nuke the ADC".

You'd be surprised how often assassins don't realize that "Oh, there's a Nasus right there I shouldn't go in", or "Oh, that Veigar has R ready and over a thousand AP".

The sheer amount of Rengars that I've shut down when they leapt on my ADC from their ult with hard CC is epic. 

Every time they are like:

"Fuck you, Nami!!!!!jfgikeksoanfod"

If your gameplay paradigm revolves around leaping on top of a squishy carry, you better bet your ass that the support is gonna be ready and waiting to pull the trigger on that CC.

Ive pissed off a rengar because they kept trying to jump out at people and like 15 times i ultied the person right as i saw them jump as me being Zilean. Then he was in the middle of everyone and then slowed and stunned and is just like "well. I guess ill die." XD it was funny cause even from unwarded bushes he jumps but because he was so predictable it was easy as heck to know where he is.

I was laughing so hard about just how many times his 100 to 0 burst got turned around into this giant bait pretty much
Awesome!!

Can't you do this with any form of knock up, knock back or displacement? Well rhetorical question, you can. What I'm saying is hooks are the least reliable way of catching her unless you're positioned in the straight line that LB is jumping so you don't have to try and catch her from the side.

So many weird things happen in norms

I've seen tf ulting right in front of me as if ignoring i have cc
I've seen karsus ult just to get the rylai's proc
Everyone has seen Yasuo mains trying to 1v5

Aims my dash at you, 
hits the ADC
You baited them.
-picks dh sona and blows lb before she can complete her combo- 4v5
